function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increasing air quality in many polluted cities due to COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Positive impact on the environment but potential risk if the lockdown is lifted rapidly","Mitigation":"Gradual lifting of lockdown with measures to control emissions","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring and control technologies","People":"Population of polluted cities","Owner":"Government and environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Water pollution reduction due to COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Positive impact on water bodies but potential risk if lockdown is lifted without proper waste management","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective waste management practices","Technologies":"Water treatment and waste management technologies","People":"Local communities and industrial sectors","Owner":"Local government and industry regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Controversial debate on the origin of COVID-19 (natural mutant vs bio-engineered)","Impact":"Potential misinformation and mistrust in public health authorities","Mitigation":"Transparent communication of scientific findings and evidence-based education","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing and research technologies","People":"General public, scientific community, and health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"}]}
